channel.title: Meme on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Meme on David Moreno blog

item.title: Book meme
item.description: Grab the nearest book. Open it to page 56. Find the fifth sentence. Post the text of the sentence in your journal along with these instructions. Don’t dig for your favorite book, the cool book, or the intellectual one: pick the CLOSEST. “De esta triste estancia en la capital de Colombia se rescata el que pudieron ver jugar al mítico Real Madrid contra el Millonarios.“ Translation: “From this sad stay in the capital of Colombia, it was worth they saw the mitical Real Madrid play Millonarios.

item.title: self meme: why not?
item.description: From kov: Take a picture of yourself right now. Don’t change your clothes, don’t fix your hair…just take a picture. Post that picture with NO editing. Post these instructions with your picture.
